title: @parse_afni_name
description: A script to parse an AFNI name, outputting the path, prefix, view, and sub-brick selection string.

output_path.title: Parsed Path
output_path.description: Output path parsed from the AFNI name

output_prefix.title: Parsed Prefix
output_prefix.description: Output prefix parsed from the AFNI name

output_view.title: Parsed View
output_view.description: Output view parsed from the AFNI name

output_subbrick.title: Parsed Sub-Brick
output_subbrick.description: Output sub-brick selection string parsed from the AFNI name
